description:
From park days, to sessioning your local trails on your e-MTB, this lightweight helmet will help keep you safe. Based in Sweden, POC has been making cutting edge personal safety equipment for snowsports and cycling for nearly two decades. Sitting at the top of their enduro and trail line, the Kortal Race helmet is loaded with technical details to maximize your comfort and protection, when dropping in.

  • MIPS Integra (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) reduces rotational forces in an oblique impact. Integra uses moving pads instead of a moving inner liner to provide the protection of standard MIPS, but using less space and allowing more ventilation
  • twICEme® NFC medical ID system allows you to register your helmet with the free app. Through the app you can load emergency contacts and important medical information. With the twICEme system, a first responder can scan your helmet for instant access to time sensitive medical information
  • RECCO® reflector allow search and rescue teams to find you faster should things take a turn for the worse
  • Break-away brim helps absorb impact, decreasing the force that makes it to you, like a crumple zone in a car
  • Brim rises up and out of the way, leaving room for your goggles, sunglasses, or even an action camera
  • Internal aramid bridge adds strength and reduces the chance of puncture without adding extra weight
  • Adjustable fit system lets you dial in your perfect fit
  • Extended protection wraps around the base of the skull
  • Lightweight straps are easy to adjust, and super comfy
  • Lots of vents help you keep a cool head, pulling air in the front and letting it exhaust out the back
  • Meets Dutch NTA 8776 e-bike helmet standard
  • Bright orange colour from POC’s Attention, Visibility, Interaction, and Protection (AVIP) initiative that maximizes visibility
name: POC Kortal Race MIPS Helmet - Unisex
